abstract: A federal judge on Wednesday gave a group of former Harvard students two weeks to finalize and back up their claim that Facebook‘s founder stole their ideas to create the fast-growing social networking Web site.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday gave a group of former Harvard students two weeks to finalize and back up their claim that Facebook‘s founder stole their ideas to create the fast-growing social networking Web site.

headline.main: Judge Tells Plaintiffs in Facebook Suit to Back Up Claims
